com.gigya.socialize.android.event

Interface GSSocializeEventListener


  • public interface GSSocializeEventListener
    Listener for handling Socialize namespace events.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Invoked after a new provider connection was added to the user.

    • Method Detail

      • onLogin

        void onLogin(java.lang.String provider,
           GSObject user,
           java.lang.Object context)
        Invoked after an account was logged in to successfuly.
        Parameters:
        provider - The provider that was used for authentication.
        user - The logged in user object.
        context - The context object that was passed to the method initiating the login.

      • onLogout

        void onLogout(java.lang.Object context)
        Invoked after a user has logged out.
        Parameters:
        context - The context object that was passed to the method initiating the logout.

      • onConnectionAdded

        void onConnectionAdded(java.lang.String provider,
                     GSObject user,
                     java.lang.Object context)
        Invoked after a new provider connection was added to the user.
        Parameters:
        provider - The provider that was used for authentication.
        user - The updated user object.
        context - The context object that was passed to the method initiating the action.

      • onConnectionRemoved

        void onConnectionRemoved(java.lang.String provider,
                       java.lang.Object context)
        Invoked after a new provider connection was removed from the user.
        Parameters:
        provider - The provider that was disconnected from the user.
        context - The context object that was passed to the method initiating the action.
